forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 11C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 52F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low around 45F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 10C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
